text: is it possible to fetch a form submission with a supplied submissionGuid via HUBL?  I need to extract the email address later on to add in a few custom contact properties.
is there a HUBL API for it?  or will it need to use the JS API?  the site is on HubSpot CMS so I donâ€™t want to embed an API key within a Request to the HTTP API if it needs to be run client side.
I can find docs for the Form API but am not seeing any mention of the submission guid to fetch an already submitted form and/or contact.
